title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about giving a gold earring to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a gift of a gold earring: A person feels happy when he buys gold or receives it as a gift in all its forms, whether it is a ring, a chain, or an earring. So does the dream interpret kindness and the gift of a gold earring? Interpretation of a dream about a gift of a gold earring What is the interpretation of a dream about a gift with a gold earring? There are interpretations Different meanings relate to seeing a gift of a golden earring in a dream, as if it was seen by an unmarried woman, then this is good news for the success of the marriage and relationship. If the husband is the one who gives this gift to his wife and feels happy in the dream, then this indicates the close relationship between them and the husband’s willingness to provide various gifts to make her happy. It also shows the dreamer seeing that everyone around her wishes her well and is helping her in her life to progress and achieve her dreams. If a woman sees that her father or older brother has given her an earring as a gift, then the dream indicates the help that this person gives her and his valuable advice to her. If the girl is looking for She is looking for a job that satisfies her and meets her needs. She will find it, God willing, after this dream and will be happy with it. What is the interpretation of a dream about giving gold earrings to Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin confirms that giving gifts in a dream conveys good news to the fortuneteller, especially if the gift is a gold earring. It promises a pregnant woman. Who sees the gift of a golden earring that her son will be a good person in the future, close to God and always ready to obey him. The girl’s bad outlook on life changes and she thinks better and positively after this vision that makes a big difference in her life and her dealings. If a man sees himself receiving a gold earring as a gift in... His dream, then the dream will be good for him because it indicates good religious conditions and his adherence to the Qur’an and Sunnah. The previous dream may confirm that his wife will give birth to him a good son soon, who will serve him and carry out the things he asks for without disobeying him. Ibn Sirin says: If a girl sees this dream and takes the earring and puts it in her ear This is good news for her about her marriage to a person with good morals and adherence to matters of religion and Sunnah. The Dream Interpretation section on an Egyptian site from Google contains many interpretations and questions from fans that you can view. Dream interpretation of a gift of a golden earring for a single woman. A large group of dream interpretation scholars believe that the girl An unmarried woman who receives a gift of a golden earring in a dream is an indication of an upcoming marriage. There are other interpretations related to this vision, as if her father or mother gave her the earring, this indicates her appetite for her attention, in addition to their valuable advice to her, which she must listen to so that she does not Regret it later. The girl comes out of the sad period she is going through and enters a more stable period after she got the golden earring and put it in a dream, and God knows best. And if she sees the opposite, which is that she is pulling her neck by her ears, then the differences between her and her life partner may increase, and the relationship may become more complicated. As for the earrings Silver brings her happiness and shows her connection to a good person with good morals who will honor her in her life and bring happiness to her soul. It is expected that

title: The 20 most important interpretations of a dream about bananas by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretations of a dream about bananas: Bananas are considered one of the delicious natural fruits that are rich in many benefits for the body and are distinguished by their yellow color. Follow us. Interpretations of a dream about bananas: Interpretation scholars say that seeing bananas in a dream indicates good luck and many good things that the dreamer will soon obtain and be happy with. And if the fortuneteller sees that he By picking delicious bananas, it will turn into material gains that he will obtain as a result of his effort and effort. As for seeing a married man in a dream eating bananas, this gives him good news of sustenance with good offspring soon, and God will fix his condition. Seeing bananas in a dream also indicates the health and comfort that God gives to the dreamer. In the coming days. If the dreamer is a merchant and sees bananas in a dream, this means abundant money that he will earn in his life. If a student sees in a dream that she is eating a ripe banana, this promises her great success and distinction that she will achieve in her academic or professional life. If a debtor dreams that he is eating Bananas, this symbolizes getting rid of worries and debts and paying them completely in the near future. If a married woman sees bananas in her home in a dream, it will give her good news about bliss and a stable married life that she will be happy with. Interpretation of a dream about bananas by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin says that a dream about bananas in The dream indicates a lot of goodness and benefits that the dreamer will receive soon. Also, the dreamer seeing delicious bananas in a dream indicates the long life that she will enjoy in her life and in good health. If the patient dreams that he is eating yellow bananas, this symbolizes the approach of his death and he must approach God. If a married man sees in a dream that a banana is planted and growing in his house, it means that his wife will become pregnant soon and she will be fair and just with them. Seeing a yellow banana in a dream means that he will face many difficulties and problems during that period. What is the interpretation of seeing bananas in a dream for a woman Single? If an unmarried girl sees bananas in a dream, this indicates the approaching date of her wedding. If the dreamer sees bananas in a dream, this means that he will achieve the dreams and aspirations he seeks. As for the dreamer who sees bananas and buys them from the market, it symbolizes an opportunity Good work that will be available to you soon. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is eating bananas, this indicates the good luck that she will have in the coming days. Seeing a girl in a dream with bananas means that she will receive many positive changes and will turn them for the better. Also, the dreamer’s vision Mixing bananas with nuts means that he will enjoy a comfortable and more prosperous life. If a girl sees a yellow banana in a dream, this portends a new and successful romantic relationship that will lead to marriage. If the dreamer is a student and sees bananas in a dream, this means that he will achieve what he wants and will get high bikes. What What is the interpretation of bananas in a dream for a married woman? Interpretation scholars believe that seeing a married woman in a dream means bananas, which indicates a stable married life and the happiness that she will obtain. In the event that

title: Interpretation of driving a car in a dream with a man I know

preview.html: Learn the interpretation of driving a car in a dream with a man I know. Interest in the science of dream interpretation goes back to the ancient Sumerian civilization, the first human civilization known to humanity, which was able to decipher many dream symbols. From the Greek culture, who believed that dreams are divine messages sent from the gods, and at night it comes to a person’s mind to preach good news or to warn him of the bad things he may face in the coming days. Just as the Muslim Arabs did not leave their mark in the field of dream interpretation, it came to us Many excelled in this field, such as Ibn Kathir, Ibn Khaldun, Ibn Sirin, and Nabulsi. Today we present to you the interpretation of seeing a car in a dream with a well-known man from the Encyclopedia website. The interpretation of driving a car in a dream with a man I know. In general, a car in a dream symbolizes a change in the viewer’s circumstances and change, Whether this change is for the better or for the worse is due to the various events in the vision and the dreamer’s circumstances. When a man sees in a dream that he is driving a car with a man he knows, this indicates the arrival of his source of livelihood, which may be represented by money, abundance of sustenance, profits, or a promotion at work, while Seeing himself riding in an old or broken car with a familiar face indicates distress and pain, and the fortune teller’s circumstances will change for the worse. God knows best. When a married man sees that he is riding in a car with a familiar face and is happy, this indicates stability in his circumstances with his wife and a change in his circumstances for the better, and God knows best. And if he The person driving the car is a single girl with a familiar face, so this is good news that this person will actually propose to her. Interpretation of a dream about driving a car in the back seat with someone I know: Seeing a car with a familiar face in the back seat indicates that the circumstances of the dreamer will change for the better and the good news will please his heart. Soon, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about driving in a car with someone you love for individuals: Seeing an unmarried woman driving a car with someone with whom she has a love relationship explains this girl’s strong desire to complete the days of her life with this person and that she is completely ready to sacrifice herself for him in order to achieve this vision. This vision can It refers to that person who proposes to her and marries her on Indeed. Driving a car in a dream with a man I know about single people. Seeing an unmarried woman in a car with someone she knows means that this person will propose to her and marry her soon, God willing, and when an unmarried woman sees in a dream a green car This indicates her good intentions and morals. If a single woman dreams that she is sitting with a familiar man in the front seat of a car, this means that she will achieve great success in her professional life or that she will find a job opportunity or an offer. Soon, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about driving a car for a divorced woman: Seeing a divorced woman driving a car in a dream means that her circumstances will change for the better, which will lead her to her heart. Also, driving a car for a divorced woman indicates the time...

title: Interpretation of a dream about fitting a new dress for a divorced woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a new dress in a dream for a single girl: When an unmarried girl describes a wedding dress in her dream, this means that she will get married soon. This vision is also the best evidence of success in academic life, God willing. When she made a new dress but discovered that it did not suit her and decided to change some details About him. Point out the many and varied crises that she will face, confront and confront. Seeing white clothes in a dream for an unmarried woman is a good sign of her good morals. Also, seeing an unmarried woman in white clothes is a symbol of her good health and sound mind as well. Wearing white clothes in a dream is A sign of the collapse of people suffering from experiences. Buying white clothes is a sign of the changes that will affect her life, God willing. As for the clothes that are spread, they are white. It indicates that she is a girl with a good reputation among the people and that she is a pure girl. Whether she sees pink clothes, this indicates that Her life is full of joy. Seeing blue clothes for unmarried women is a sign that she will marry a rich man. Seeing a new dress in a dream is for an unmarried girl. It is just a good sign of good news that she will hear. Or a sign that what she wants will come true by God’s will. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a blue dress for a man. Interpretation of seeing the details of a new dress in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees the details of a new dress, this is evidence of her stability with her family. He will also get relief to relieve distress if he is actually suffering from any anxiety or crisis, God willing. But in If he has a daughter and gives her a new dress in a dream, this is good news that she will get married if she is already ready, and God knows best. As for white clothes in a dream for a married woman, it symbolizes purity and tranquility in married life, or good news of visiting the Sacred House of God, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When A woman sees herself wearing white clothes, this could be a sign of a blessed and comfortable life. If she sees the dress white and long, it shows her life is full of happiness, especially her life with her husband. When one sees many dresses in a dream, this dream indicates that one is living A stable and happy life. Taking a dress from a dead person in a dream is a praiseworthy vision that symbolizes calm and the disappearance of problems by God’s command. If she sees herself wearing short clothes, this is a warning and a warning about her negligence in dealing with God Almighty. Seeing her husband’s white clothes and washing them. Perhaps it is a sign of... She is a woman who keeps her husband’s secret and is always grateful to him and his behavior towards her and others. Seeing that the husband is the one wearing white clothes in a woman’s dream is a sign that he loves her and shows his respect for her. title: Theft in a dream and the interpretation of a dream of theft, escape, and stealing money in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: It was believed that seeing theft in a dream is annoying to the dreamer, but not all of its interpretations are as bad as some believe, and there is no need to worry. If you see theft in a dream, this may mean that the dreamer is a person who seizes opportunities or that he has suffered injustice that God takes away from him, and this may mean that he is involved in committing sins and dares to commit them. Theft in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Theft in a dream: If the dreamer sees someone stealing his car, this may mean that he will become his teacher, but if he steals a donkey, a horse, or one of the animals, for example, it may mean that he will give the opportunity to travel for him or travel with him soon, If his keys are stolen, the evidence, however, is that this person will cause problems for the dreamer that may prevent him from reaching his goal, and in the event that his pen is stolen. Perhaps this is evidence that he will overcome it. Ibn Sirin believes that if a person sees in a dream someone close to him stealing, this may indicate that he flatters the dreamer and speaks ill of him in reality, but if the thief is unknown, this may indicate that. The death of a member of a house that was stolen in a dream. If the dreamer sees that someone is stealing his clothes or clothing, then this thief may be one of the reasons for his marriage, and if the stolen clothes are internal, this may indicate that someone is delving into secrets and symptoms. The dreamer talks about it in front of the general public and strangers. But if the dreamer is unmarried and sees someone stealing her clothes, this may mean that she lost a good job opportunity or rejected a good person who wants to propose to her, and if someone steals the passport, this indicates the loss of opportunities. Who is the owner of the dream in reality, and stealing money from the house, may indicate that something important is lost, but it returns to the owner of the dream again. If money is stolen from the bag, this is a sign that you will lose your livelihood or lose an inheritance. What is the interpretation of a dream about money being stolen from me? If the dreamer sees a person stealing his money, this may indicate that this person will marry a woman from the Prophet’s family, or the vision may indicate complete blessing. I dreamed that I was stealing paper money, so what is the interpretation of the dream? If a single woman sees herself stealing something and running away This may be a sign that she has bad habits and should be avoided. The Egyptian site is the largest dream interpretation site in the Arab world. All you have to do is type the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site in Google and get the correct interpretations. What is the interpretation of seeing theft in a dream for a man? If he sees The dreamer sees a stranger stealing his house and furniture, this means that he often scolds him for his bad deed. But if a man sees that someone near him is stealing, this may indicate that this person is flattering him and speaking badly about him in reality, but if he sees that someone is stealing his car, It may mean that she will be his teacher and give him knowledge. If the dreamer is married and sees in a dream that someone stole his table, this may indicate that his wife will fall seriously ill, but if the dreamer is a young, unmarried man, it may mean that he is exposed. to a serious financial crisis.

title: Interpretation of a lizard in a dream

preview.html: We present to you the interpretation of a lizard in a dream, which often indicates an enemy or an evil person hiding in plain sight, unless this lizard is green, then it is good and abundant, God Almighty willing, and therefore getting rid of a lizard indicates getting rid of enemies and evil people, God willing, and in The following article discusses the different interpretations of a dream about a lizard, so follow us in the encyclopedia. Interpretation of a lizard in a dream. If he dreams that there is a lizard chasing him, this indicates the presence of an enemy planning to harm him. If he sees that he is killing that lizard, this indicates the return of his lost right to him. And if he sees If a lizard in front of him has died and you did not kill it, this indicates that his reputation is improving after it worsened. If the lizard in a dream escapes death or murder, this indicates some problems and tribulations that he may face in his life, so let him be patient and ask for reward. If the orchid is present in a workplace Or a place, this indicates the problems that this place may face or the problems that the viewer may face in his work. Also, seeing a lizard in a dream indicates following instincts and desires and submitting to them and not caring about the feelings of others. If the lizard he sees in his dream is green in color, this indicates On the immediate goodness, God willing, of material profit or recovery from illness. And if he sees that there is a lizard in a dream that eats insects, this indicates that he will gain protection and security, which may disturb him. An orchid flower in a man’s dream also indicates the presence of an unstable woman with a bad temper. Difficult. Seeing a lizard in a single woman’s dreamIf an unmarried woman sees a multi-colored lizard in her dream, this indicates her enemies and those who are abusing her. If she kills that lizard, it means that she got rid of these people and removed them from her life. If she sees that there is a lizard in her fur, This indicates that a man who is not suitable for marriage is approaching her. If she kills the lizard in bed, this indicates her divorce from that man if she marries him. If he sees that he is eating the flesh of that lizard, this indicates the abundant goodness that will befall him, God willing. If you are a black lizard, This indicates the presence of bad acquaintances that she meets, but they were able to get rid of them. Interpretation of a lizard in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a lizard for a married woman in a dream indicates her husband’s illness and her sadness for him during this illness. If she sees that there is a lizard in one of her husband’s pockets, this means that he throws Forbidden money and he may not realize it. If she sees that there is a lizard on her bed, this indicates the problems that arise between her and her husband. If the orchid is green, this indicates that many of the good things she wants to achieve have been achieved. Interpretation of a dream about a lizard for a pregnant womanIf A pregnant woman saw a green orchid in her dream, this indicates that she will give birth in good health, God willing. If you are a red orchid, this means that she will give birth to a new baby before her due date. If the orchid is black, this means that the baby is a male. To interpret a new dream, you can Use it as a live dream interpretation application. This was our conversation about the interpretation of...

title: Interpretation of a dream about cake: The meaning of eating holiday cake in a dream

preview.html: Seeing cakes and cakes for single, married, pregnant and divorced women, whether they eat, buying, preparing and distributing biscuits, making cakes and chocolate according to Ibn Sirin, etc. Interpretation of a dream about cake according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing cakes in the case of a dreamer in his dream is a journey to the doors for him. If the dreamer sees a cake with someone who cannot eat cake, The dream is evidence of worry, anxiety, anguish, and difficulty. On the other hand, cakes in a dream promise a little money, and in addition, they can be considered good and a blessing for the dreamer. If the dreamer sees a cake in his dream and does not eat from it, this indicates that he is saving his money. Eid cakes are evidence On the beautiful words spoken about you or the beautiful relationships that have arisen between you and new people. If you see a cake with white cream, this symbolizes the facilitation of pending matters, comfort and comfort after anxiety. Cakes are good news for individuals. When you see yourself making a cake for special occasions, for example, birthdays or weddings, it is a sign of positive significance. Although birthday may be old age for you, making a birthday cake a dream indicates love and that your friendships will last a lifetime. Whoever sees a wedding cake, this indicates good luck, especially for a woman, as a wedding cake for her in a dream indicates good luck. As well as a new beginning, a dream about cakes may be a strange dream for some people, but cakes in a dream means the dreamer’s journey. Besides, a dream about cakes can be interpreted as it may come to the dreamer or it could be a feeling of worry, fear or worry about the next Who eats a cake in a dream The dreamer must expect that if he is in good condition, goodness will return to him, and if he is also in bad condition, evil will return to him. Among other interpretations of the dream of cake, we find that it indicates a little money, and on the other hand it can be interpreted as goodness and blessings. For the dreamer. Interpretation of a cake in a dream. A person who sees cakes in a dream can be evidence of the presence of positive signs that the viewer feels. This is evidence that cakes are evidence of the love and feelings that the viewer receives from others around him, and they can indicate the goodness that the person acquires and returns to him. Also, seeing a cough in a dream could be an internal feeling within a person of fear, anxiety, tension, seriousness, and cruelty. In addition, it could indicate a little money that a person earns, kindness, and blessing at times, both of which vary depending on his condition and emotion. Interpretation of cakes in A dream for men: Seeing cake in a dream is a clear indication of the journey that comes to one’s doors, and the journey is the abundant goodness that the dreamer will receive. Seeing cake is a sign of anxiety, problems, disagreements, and an indication of the hardships and hardships that a person goes through in his life. Also, seeing cake Sometimes it is a sign of goodness, joy and pleasure in life and getting rid of the problems and obstacles that you suffer from in life. Cakes are evidence of a lack of money for

title: Seeing pet dogs in a dream for single and married women

preview.html: Seeing dogs in a dream for singles and married people, seeing dogs in a dream is one of the most common things, there are many dreams related to dogs, either a dream of a dog attacking someone, or seeing it barking, either seeing pet dogs or seeing black dogs, just in case these cases have their own interpretation and differ from one person to another, which is a man’s vision of a man, the dog differs from the vision of a married woman for an unmarried or engaged woman, and there are many sayings about it. Interpretation of seeing a dog in a dream by Ibn Sirin The details of the dream are generally very important, so you should focus when interpreting your dream on the color, size, behavior, etc. of the dog. Dream interpreters agree that a small dog in a dream always refers to a small child loved by his family, and Ibn Sirin says that seeing a small dog puppy can refer to a foundling who came from prostitution, God forbid. As for the colors of the dog, the black dog indicates an enemy from a relative or close to the person, and this blackness expresses the hatred, malice and anger that he carries in his heart from this narrator, but if the dog is white, this is evidence of loyalty and sincerity of feelings, as seeing pet dogs in a dream indicates On the presence of a very loyal and faithful friend, and seeing the presence of a dog in the mother is evidence of the mother's care. There are some sayings that say that seeing a dog in general in a dream indicates aggression against the seer, and while playing, enjoying and petting the dog in the dream, it shows the happiness and satisfaction that will come, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a sea dog in a dream The sea in a dream always indicates goodness, invitation and security to achieve it, God willing, and seeing a dog a lot in a dream is one of the things that indicate treachery and hostility, and God knows best. Constant annoyance and distrust of friends and relatives without a specific reason. When a person sees himself near a sea dog while swimming with him in the water, this is a sign of many competitors and evidence that he will face many great obstacles and overcome them, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a dog in a single woman's dream Seeing a dog in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that there is someone in her life who hates her beauty, and if it is black, this indicates treachery and betrayal. The red dog shows that someone is following her in all aspects of her life, and the brown dog is a sign of envy and the gray dog ​​is a sign of injustice towards the owner of the vision. And if this dog is gray, this means that there is a woman who resembles her in friendship and affection, and wants evil for her. Interpretation of seeing a dog in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees a dog, this means that there are people targeting her and her marital life and her psychological and family stability by creating problems and feeding her gossip to fix her with her husband, and she must. Beware of these people. Interpretation of seeing a dog in a dream for a pregnant or widowed woman Seeing a pregnant dog is evidence of her envy and it is possible that it is from her relatives, so she must maintain the legitimate ruqya and keep the male until God saves her and protects her from this danger. In conclusion, for the widow

Therefore, she must keep the legal Rakiya and keep the male until God saves her and protects her from this danger. In conclusion, for the widow

title: Interpretation of seeing tomatoes in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing tomatoes in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam al-Sadiq. Scientists and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through a website.visionroy2a.com Since tomatoes are one of the most used plants in every home and are used in all foods, seeing them in a dream is a sign of abundance. Sustenance and goodness, so we will talk about seeing them in a dream for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a man and a young man. What is the interpretation of seeing tomatoes in a dream for a single girl: A single girl seeing tomatoes in a dream indicates that it will bring her goodness and a lot of food. The dream of buying tomatoes indicates her approach to marriage From a man of good character who is characterized by piety and closeness to his Lord. See also: Interpretation of seeing tomatoes in a dream Interpretation of seeing tomatoes in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman buying tomatoes in a dream indicates opening the door to support her husband with a large property or inheritance. A married woman seeing tomatoes in a dream indicates... The stability of her married life and her great happiness with her children and husband. See also: Interpretation of seeing ISIS in a dream. Interpretation of a divorced woman seeing tomatoes in a dream: A divorced woman seeing tomatoes in a dream, the meaning of God compensating her for her sad days and bringing her goodness and blessings. A divorced woman seeing tomatoes in a dream, the meaning of her marriage to a good man. He seeks to make her happy and stand by her side. What is the interpretation of a man who sees tomatoes in a dream: A man sees many bags of tomatoes in a dream, indicating his great position in his work and his extraordinary intelligence to rise to a high position. A man sees a large amount of tomatoes in a dream, indicating that God will compensate him for days Jihad and boredom. See also: Interpretation of seeing cancer in a dream. Interpretation of a pregnant woman who sees tomatoes in a dream: Seeing a pregnant woman carrying tomatoes in a dream is an indication of God’s satisfaction with him and nourishing him with many blessings. Seeing a pregnant woman buying a lot of tomatoes in a dream is an indication of facilitating her birth and ending the period of pregnancy pain. See also: The interpretation of seeing a dining table in a dream. What is the interpretation of a young man who sees tomatoes in a dream: Seeing a young man buying tomatoes in a dream. His family reported that he obtained a lot of money through his mother’s inheritance. A young man seeing tomatoes in a dream is a sign of the coming of happiness, joy, broad nourishment, and a change in his life. For the better. Seeing tomatoes in a dream for a single young man is a sign to open the doors of livelihood for him and his family. What is the interpretation of the vision of buying tomatoes in a dream: Seeing yourself buying tomatoes in a dream announces the dreamer’s goodness and success in his life. Seeing a crop of tomatoes in a dream and buying them is a sign of the dreamer’s feeling of happiness and love with his family. See also Interpretation of seeing heavy rain in a dream: Interpretation of seeing tomatoes in a dream: Seeing planting tomatoes in a dream indicates the success of the dreamer in his projects and trade and achieving large profits. Seeing planting tomatoes in a dream is one of the beautiful visions that foretells a good king and abundant food through someone close to him. What is the interpretation of seeing tomatoes in a dream? Cutting tomatoes in a dream with a knife: Seeing yourself cutting tomatoes in a dream with a knife is a sign of failure

title: Interpretation of seeing a cut moustache in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a cut off mustache in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. His mustache has grown in size, and there are those who see in a dream that he is cutting his mustache, so today in this article you will learn the interpretation of seeing a cut mustache in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream of seeing a mustache being cut in a dream. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Imam Ibn Sirin continues the interpretation of a dream of cutting a mustache. However, it is one of the dreams that symbolizes the nature of the dreamer’s personality in reality and that he seeks to hide his true identity from those around him in the dreamer’s absence. Sharp in reality. Ibn Sirin explained that one of the meanings of this dream is that it expresses bad companions. When the dreamer sees that he is cutting off his mustache, but he does not want to do so at all, then in reality it carries an unpleasant sign that indicates the loss of money, and God knows best. When the dreamer dreams that he He cuts his mustache and it looks bad. This is considered a far-fetched dream that expresses the bad psychological state of the pioneer, and it also indicates that something bad has happened to him in reality. If the dreamer sees that he is shaving his mustache, then this is one of the hateful dreams that express the deepening of the symptoms, but it expresses The changes that he is going through in reality. When the dreamer sees the hair of his mustache appearing in a dream after shaving it, this is a sign of the dreamer’s evil actions by stealing other people’s money. In the case of dreaming of an excessively long mustache, this is a symbol of unpleasant symbols that indicate disobedience to God and an abundance of sins and disobedience. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a cut mustache in a dream. Interpretation of Al-Nabulsi. As for Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of this vision, it is one of the dreams that symbolize sustenance with money, and it is also one of the signs that indicate piety and good luck. Al-Nabulsi indicated that shaving the mustache in a dream is a praiseworthy dream that expresses a change in circumstances. The fortuneteller is for the better. As for seeing a long mustache in a dream, this means that the dreamer is facing a problem in his life that is causing him sadness and distress. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a mustache cut in a dream for a man: In the case of an unmarried young man, if he sees in a dream that he is cutting his mustache incompletely, this means The dreamer is late in performing his responsibilities on earth. As for the dream of shaving the mustache in a dream, it is one of the good dreams that indicate marriage soon, and God knows best. In the case of a white mustache, this dream indicates a lack of confidence in reality. Jurists have indicated that cutting the mustache in a dream is Visions that portend the coming of financial crises. This vision also indicates staying away from the evil person in the dreamer’s life. If the dreamer sees that he is cutting and trimming another person’s mustache, this reflects how positive the dreamer’s personality is in his love of helping others. Seeing a mustache being groomed in a dream means that the news The joy will reach the dreamer in reality at the professional level of promotion, and God knows best. Seeing shaving a mustache in a dream for a married man symbolizes marriage again, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he admires his mustache, this reflects certain aspects of his personality, including self-confidence. And the desire for constant change. Seeing a dirty mustache in a dream means that the dreamer is actually suffering from psychological damage. When he dreams
